column3: Latest;Koh Kong:------ A woman living in Koh Por village
column6: has given birth on a small boat while she and her family were traveling in a storm.------The incident occurred on July 5
column8: the obstetrician of Koh Kong Referral Hospital rushed to the rescue and transported the mother and baby to the hospital for treatment.------This is not the first case of water births in Koh Kong Province
column9: with people living on isolated islands and traveling by sea. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/458613
